attributes.action: Put an extra Tick box on the bottom of ballot papers saying "no confidence in any of the above"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe all current political parties are completely untrustworthy and corrupt and I think this would be a good way of finding out how many of the public feel the same way

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
